creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: two short lines at top followed by two longer lines of delicate yet jagged and angular calligraphy on paper infused with varying gradients of blue and blue-grey fibers (or pigment?); paper is plain at center, darker blue gradient waves at top, lighter blue/grey at bottom; a few gold flecks throughout
markings: on back, R side, in pencil, Japanese inscription
title: Green Trees
